/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.LtsModelMappingDAO.selectLtsModelByKey] */
SELECT LTS_MODEL_CD ,VIN_NO FROM ( SELECT LTS_MODEL_CD ,VIN_NO ,LENGTH( REPLACE(VIN_NO1,'_','')) VIN_LENGTH ,LENGTH(OCN_CD) AS OCN_LENGTH FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(VIN_NO ,'*','_') AS VIN_NO1 ,LTS_MODEL_CD ,OCN_CD ,VIN_NO FROM SE_1062T )A WHERE #{vinNo} LIKE VIN_NO1 AND (OCN_CD = ( SELECT OCN_CD FROM SA_0121T WHERE VIN_NO = #{vinNo} ) OR OCN_CD ='ALL') AND LENGTH( REPLACE(VIN_NO1,'_','')) <> 1 ORDER BY OCN_LENGTH DESC )WHERE ROWNUM = 1

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.LtsModelMappingDAO.selectMappingLtsModelCdByKey] */
SELECT LTS_MODEL_CD , LTS_MODEL_NM FROM ( SELECT A.LTS_MODEL_CD ,( SELECT
LTS_EN_NM LTS_CHN_NM
FROM SE_1064T WHERE LTS_MODEL_CD = A.LTS_MODEL_CD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS LTS_MODEL_NM ,LENGTH( REPLACE(VIN_NO,'_','')) VIN_LENGTH FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(VIN_NO ,'*','_') AS VIN_NO , LTS_MODEL_CD , OCN_CD FROM SE_1062T )A WHERE #{sVinNo} LIKE VIN_NO
AND (OCN_CD = ( SELECT OCN_CD FROM SA_0121T WHERE VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} ) OR OCN_CD ='ALL') ORDER BY VIN_LENGTH DESC )WHERE ROWNUM = 1
